A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Speaking from the perspective of a die hard fan... In the almost three hour runtime\, I went from looking forward to more Starwars to knowing that the Starwars that I love is dead and gone forever.\n\nEven though the prequels were campy and poorly directed\, the stories were great! What we got here was offensively dismissive to everything the franchise built to this point. This was a great opportunity truly squandered.
